value.name: Just what went down when a Gresham police officer killed Israel Berry in Portland a year ago?
value.description: Officer James Doyle feared for his life and considered Berry's car a dangerous weapon, his lawyer says. Investigators have raised concerns about Doyle’s account based on body camera video and forensic evidence,

value.name: ‘We just want to know what happened’: Few details released 11 months after Gresham police shot and killed man

value.name: ‘Absolutely frustrating’: Witnesses waiting to testify 11 months after deadly police shooting

value.name: DA Schmidt Hires Outside Attorney to Investigate Gresham Officer Shooting
value.description: Multnomah County District Attorney Mike Schmidt has hired a private practice attorney to review the death investigation of Israel Berry, a man killed by a Gresham police officer nearly a year ago.
